<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Final Sacrifice](/Spells.aspx?ID=1992)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=604" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 245 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Target** 1 creature with the  minion  trait that you summoned or permanently control
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=2297) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You channel disruptive energies through the bond between you and your minion, causing it to violently explode. The target is immediately slain, and the explosion deals 6d6 fire damage to creatures within 20 feet of it with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save. If the target has the [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555) or [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=732) trait, the spell deals cold damage and has the cold trait instead of the [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604) trait. Attempting to cast this spell targeting a creature that you temporarily seized control of, such as an [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=722) commanded by [_bind undead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1449), automatically fails and breaks the controlling effect.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Final Sacrifice
